Thanks for reporting the problem! We are looking into it - unfortunately this one is hard to tackle - but should also not interrupt your service.

I caught this error after having to panic close geth when it wouldn't shutdown cleanly.  As suggested, it eventually caught up to the head of the chain and resumed with no issues.

*edit*  Actually, it seems to repeatedly fall out of sync and generate other errors.  Ultimately, I wiped the db and started fresh.
